701185f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 197th Street (East)
701185f-a.text:
2830 (empty lot) and 2842 Grand Concourse, east side, north from East
197th to 198th Streets. The empty lot (No. 2830) at the N.E. corner of
East 197th Street is now (1937) occupied by a 6-story apartment house,
the Town Towers.
May 6, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
